
### some POSIX command-line features  {.smaller}

* searching for programs
   * `ls -l`  →  `/bin/ls -l`
   * `make` → `/usr/bin/make`

* running in background 
   * `./someprogram &`

* redirection
   * `./someprogram >output.txt`
   * `./someprogram <input.txt`

* pipelines:
   * `./someprogram | ./somefilter`
